text: Kini and Adams is a 1997 Burkinabé French drama movie directed by Idrissa Ouedraogo and starring Vusi Kunene, David Mohloki, Nthati Moshesh, John Kani, Netsayi Chigwendere, Sibongile Mlambo. It won the Jury Prize at the 1998 Bermuda International Film Festival and was nominated for the Palme d'Or at the 1997 Cannes Film Festival. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1997 drama movies Category:Burkinabé movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Idrissa Ouedraogo
title: Kini and Adams
